news.title: OpenAI-backed biotech firm Chai Discovery raises $130M Series B at $1.3B valuation

news.title: Nvidia bulks up open source offerings with an acquisition and new open AI models
news.summary: Nvidia acquired SchedMD, the lead developer of Slurm, and launched the Nemotron 3 family of open source AI models.

news.summary: On Monday, nearly two dozen states, plus the District of Columbia, filed an amended complaint in the FTC's lawsuit against Uber. news.title: How Roomba invented the home robot — and lost the future
news.summary: For many, iRobot's Roomba robot vacuum was their first experience with a home robot. When I got my Roomba in 2005, I felt like I was a step closer to my dream of living in a Jetsons-style home where a robot did my chores for me. It was expensive, around $300 for a small black […]

news.title: Apple TV adds Google Cast streaming, but only on Android
news.summary: Now it will be easier for Android users to watch Apple TV content on their TV with the addition of Google Cast support. However, even after this update, Google Cast is only an option on the Android version of Apple TV, not the iOS version. Likewise, the Android version still doesn't support AirPlay.

news.summary: Eagle-eyed Swifties have ID’d the star’s pillow brand in a recent TV show appearance, and it’s one of my favorites as well. Coop is having a special sale to commemorate the event.

news.title: Nvidia Becomes a Major Model Maker With Nemotron 3
news.summary: The world’s top chipmaker wants open source AI to succeed—perhaps because closed models increasingly run on its rivals’ silicon.
